TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 为在任务和 Windows 运行时异步操作之间转换提供扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for converting between tasks and Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展方法重载使你能够使用.NET对象来管理从 Windows 运行时异步操作。The extension method overloads enable you to use a .NET object to manage an asynchronous operation from the Windows Runtime. 方法和方法使您能够将任务状态传递给 Windows 运行时异步动作和操作的方法。The method and the method enable you to pass started tasks to methods that take Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations. 另请参阅的方法类。See also the methods of the class. 方法由编译器，用于实现操作 (在 Visual Basic 中)。The methods are used by compilers to implement the operation ( in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction (this System.Threading.Tasks.Task source);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAsyncAction (source As Task) As IAsyncAction
static member AsAsyncAction : System.Threading.Tasks.Task -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction

span.span: The started task.

summary.span: 返回表示已开始任务的 Windows 运行时异步操作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous action that represents a started task.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已启动的任务。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 当你想要将任务传递给 Windows 运行时采用的方法，异步操作时，请使用此方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous action. 类提供静态方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)，创建并启动 Windows 运行时表示可以响应取消请求并报告进度的任务的异步操作。The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous actions that represent tasks that can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<TResult> AsAsyncOperation<TResult> (this System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TResult> source);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<!!TResult> AsAsyncOperation<TResult>(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!TResult> source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAsyncOperation(Of TResult) (source As Task(Of TResult)) As IAsyncOperation(Of TResult)
static member AsAsyncOperation : System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'Result> -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<'Result>

span.span: The type that returns the result.
The started task.

summary.span: 返回表示返回结果的已开始任务的 Windows 运行时异步操作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation that represents a started task that returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已启动的任务。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 当你想要传递到采用异步操作的 Windows 运行时方法返回的结果的任务时，请使用此方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task that returns a result to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous operation. 类提供静态方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)，创建并启动 Windows 运行时表示返回结果，并可以响应取消请求并报告进度的任务的异步操作。The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous operations that represent tasks that return results and can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

static member AsTask : Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

span.span: The asynchronous action.

summary.span: 返回表示 Windows 运行时异步操作的任务。

span.span: Returns a task that represents a Windows Runtime asynchronous action.

returns.span: 一个表示异步操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法获取Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法获取Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法获取Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations. 调用此方法重载是等效于调用扩展方法重载并指定为参数。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the extension method overload and specifying for the parameter. 这可不想要获取进度报告从报告进度的操作。This is useful when you don't want to get progress reports from an action that reports progress.
